item.title: ARMOR v0.1: Empowering Autoregressive Multimodal Understanding Model with Interleaved Multimodal Generation via Asymmetric Synergy
item.description: ARMOR: Empowers MLLMs with interleaved multimodal generation via asymmetric synergy, using limited resources.
